name: Escape from Hell (akai_0okami)
description:
Made for 8 Bits to Infinity and Weekly Game Jam 86.

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4
  • Art made using Aseprite
  • Death SFX by Philippe Groarke (https://opengameart.org/content/punches-hits-swords-and-squishes)
  • Pick up & put down torch SFX
    by Iwan 'qubodup' Gabovitch (https://opengameart.org/content/door-open-door-close-set)
  • Door SFX by j1987 (https://freesound.org/people/j1987/sounds/95000/)
  • Shadow Inside (background music) by Joshua McClean (http://mrjoshuamclean.com/royalty-free-music/)

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International
